AIConsentManager

@objc
public class AIConsentManager : NSObject, AIConsentManagerProtocol

AIConsentManager Implements AIConsentManagerProtocol and acts as a endpoint for registering, deregistering Consent Handlers for particular types and also to fetch and store a consent type.

Public methods
  • init()

    Designated Initialiser

    Declaration

    Swift

    public override init()
  • deregisterHandler(forConsentTypes:)

    Method used to de-register a consent handler of type ConsentHandlerProtocol with list of consent types.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func deregisterHandler(forConsentTypes: [String])

    Parameters

    forConsentTypes

    Array of Strings denoting the consent types to be deregistered.
  • registerHandler(handler:forConsentTypes:)

    Method used to register a consent handler of type ConsentHandlerProtocol with list of consent types.

    Throws

    AIConsentManagerErrorCodes.duplicateConsentCode if the consent type has already been registered with the registry

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func registerHandler(handler: ConsentHandlerProtocol, forConsentTypes: [String]) throws -> <<error type>>

    Parameters

    handler

    Object that implements ConsentHandlerProtocol, which si the object that will be registered for the types passed in the first parameter
    forConsentTypes

    Array of Strings denoting the consent types to be registering.
  • fetchConsentState(forConsentDefinition:completion:)

    Method used to fetch status of Consent types contained in the consent definition that is passed as the parameter.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func fetchConsentState(forConsentDefinition consentDefinition: ConsentDefinition, completion: @escaping (_ status: ConsentDefinitionStatus?, _ error: NSError?) -> Void)

    Parameters

    consentDefinition

    Consent Definition containing array of consent types whose status has to be fetched from the backend
    completion

    Block that will be invoked once the fetching operation has been completed that returns (status & error) status : ConsentDefinitionStatus containing the status of the consent definition passed in the first parameter error: NSError if there was an error that was encountered while fetching status of ConsentDefinintion
  • fetchConsentStates(forConsentDefinitions:completion:)

    Method used to fetch

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func fetchConsentStates(forConsentDefinitions consentDefinitions: [ConsentDefinition], completion: @escaping (_ list:[ConsentDefinitionStatus]?, _ error: NSError?) -> Void)

    Parameters

    consentDefinitions

    Array of Consent Definitions each containing array of consent types whose status has to be fetched from the backend.
    completion

    Block that will be invoked once the fetching operation has been completed list: Array of ConsentDefinitionStatus containing the status of each consent definition error: NSError if there was an error that was encountered while fetching statuses of ConsentDefinintions
  • storeConsentState(consent:withStatus:completion:)

    Method used to store the status of all the consent types combined in the consent definition that is paased as the first parameter.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func storeConsentState(consent consentDefinition: ConsentDefinition, withStatus status: Bool, completion: @escaping (_ result: Bool, _ error: NSError?) -> Void)

    Parameters

    consentDefinition

    Consent Definition containing array of consent types whose status has to be stored in the backend.
    status

    Bool indicating status of the consent definition that is to be stored
    completion

    Block that will be executed once the store has been completed result: Bool denoting if the consent definition was executed successfully error: NSError if there was an error that was encountered while storing the ConsentDefinintion
  • fetchConsentTypeState(forConsentType:completion:)

    Method used to fetch status of Consent types contained in the consent definition that is passed as the parameter.

    Throws

    AIConsentManagerErrorCodes.ConsentServiceErrorCode.consentDefinitionNotRegisteredErrorCode if the consent definition has not been registered with the registry

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func fetchConsentTypeState(forConsentType: String, completion: @escaping (_ status: ConsentDefinitionStatus?, _ error: NSError?) -> Void) throws

    Parameters

    forConsentType

    String containing the consent type that needs to be fetched
    completion

    Block that will be invoked once the fetching operation has been completed status: ConsentDefinitionStatus containing the status of the consent definition passed in the first parameter error: NSError if there was an error that was encountered while fetching status of ConsentDefinintion
  • registerConsentDefinitions(consentDefinitions:completion:)

    Method used to register a consent definitions which are passed as input parameter.

    Since

    2018.1.0 Method used to register a consent definitions which are passed as input parameter.

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
public func registerConsentDefinitions(consentDefinitions: [ConsentDefinition], completion: @escaping (_ error: NSError?)->())

    Parameters

    consentDefinitions

    List of consent definitions to register.
    completion

    Completion handler that will be invoked once all the consent definitions are registered error: NSError if there was an error that was encountered while registering consentDefinitions
